text: CCSS.Math.Content.HSN.RN.A.1 Explain how the definition of the meaning of rational exponents follows from extending the properties of integer exponents to those values, allowing for a notation for radicals in terms of rational exponents. For example, we define 5 .
CCSS.Math.Content.HSN.RN.A.2 Rewrite expressions involving radicals and rational exponents using the properties of exponents.
